Class WordCount

java.lang.Object
  WordCount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<WordCount>
public class WordCount
extends Object
implements Comparable<WordCount>

This class models a word frequency count. Each WordCount object contains a word and a count of the frequency of that word. There is also a compare method that will compare the WordCount with another given WordCount. The WordCount class uses the Text class which provides a means of displaying the word on a canvas.

Version:
November 2011
Author:
Dr A J Beaumont

Constructor Detail

WordCount

public WordCount(String word)
Constructor for objects of class WordCount. A new WordCount object contains a Text object representing the given text and has a count of 1.

Parameters:
word - the word for this frequency count.
Method Detail

compareTo

public int compareTo(WordCount wc)
Specified by:
compareTo in interface Comparable<WordCount>
Parameters:
wc - a WordCount object to compare against.
Returns:
When count is less than wc.getCount() this method returns -1. When count is greater than wc.getCount() this method returns 1. When count equals wc.getCount() this method returns 0.

getCount

public int getCount()
Returns:
the count associated with this word.

getText

public Text getText()
Returns:
the Text object representing this word.

incrementCount

public void incrementCount()
Increment the count for this word by one.
